text.text_translated: An asteroid is a small rock that goes around the Sun in space. NASA is now trying to record smaller asteroids. They are 140 metres wide or more. Scientists worry these asteroids could be harmful. They think there are 25,000 of this size. So far, they have recorded about 8,000. They have not found the other 17,000 yet. In 2013, a 19-metre asteroid exploded above Chelyabinsk in Russia. It injured 1,200 people. This shows medium-sized asteroids can be very dangerous. They could come into Earth’s orbit and cause damage.
